flavor: "The body is but a vessel to be filled with holy purpose."
name: Tarun Chandavarkar
text:
[reaction] After damage or horror is placed on a card you control: Replenish 1 charge or offering on an asset you control. (Limit once per round.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may either deal 1 damage or horror to a card you control or heal 1 damage or horror from a card you control.
back_flavor: Tarun was born the son of a genuine Fakir, an Indian holy man. His father was dedicated in body and soul to the protection and salvation of his community, and did not hesitate to act when the cult of Shah-Niggurat was discovered within. Though he attempted to expose them, he paid with his life, and Tarun found his father's mangled corpse at the edge of the nearby jungle. Determined to avenge him, Tarun pursued the cult, using the ways of the Fakir as his guide. He studied the scriptures and trained his body to withstand any sort of pain. Ready at last, Tarun wandered the world, earning his living by performing the Fakir's feats of endurance to fascinated onlookers, but always with his mission of holy vengeance burning in his heart.
back_text: Deck Size: 30 Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-3, Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Fakir's Sword, Measuring Up, 1 random basic weakness. Deckbuilding Restrictions: Your deck must have at least 10 more Guardian cards than Mystic cards.

flavor: "The mind must be steady, for the world is not."
name: Natalie Soulier
text: You do not discard assets in excess of available slots after they enter play. Assets played in excess of available slots gains fast. Forced - At the start of the upkeep phase, discard assets you control in excess of available slots. [elder_sign] effect: +1. You may swap an asset you control with an asset in your hand, paying the difference between their costs.
back_flavor: Natalie was born to an affluent New Orleans family, though wealth never sparked anything in her. Surrounded by the idle rich, she came to see the value in personal skill, and began to learn tricks of manual dexterity from the servants of the estate. Natalie's parents hardly approved, and when she came of age, they introduced her to an echelon of society above the one that Natalie knew. This was a world of secrecy and ritual, and of the dark unknowable. Natalie was thrilled at first, but discovered that her family had long served one of these dark powers, and that she was expected to also serve. Repulsed, she fled into the night, and began making her way as a circus performer as she seeks a way to fight her nightmarish legacy.
back_text: Deck Size: 30 Deckbuilding Options: Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-3, Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Juggler's Batons, Losing Focus, 1 random basic weakness. Deckbuilding Restrictions: Your deck must have at least 10 more Seeker cards than Rogue cards.

name: Lai Jie
text:
[reaction] When the round begins: Choose a non-weakness skill in your hand and attach it to your location or a connecting location. At the end of the round, discard the attached skill.
[elder_sign] effect: +2. If you succeed, you may choose a skill committed to this test and resolve its effects an additional time.
back_flavor: Jie was born to a family of skillful acrobats attached to the a traveling circus in China. He learned to walk on his hands as soon as he did his feet. Everything about the job appealed to Jie, from the refined dedication to the thrill of adrenaline. Though he lived the excitement as much as any, he soon discovered that fear exists for a reason. A nervous man joined the circus one day, purportedly as a magician. After only a week in their employ, Jie was the only witness when an unearthly hound appeared out of thin air, tore the man's throat out, and disappeared once again. Jie was terrified, but fascinated. He gradually achieved what people thought was impossible, but by seeking out monsters like the hound, he could defy what even he thought was impossible.
back_text: Deck Size: 30 Deckbuilding Options: Rogue cards ([rogue]) level 0-3, Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Feats of Daring, Death Defying, Foolhardy, 1 random basic weakness. Deckbuilding Restrictions: Your deck must have at least 10 more Rogue cards than Survivor cards.

name: Arturo Rangel
text:
[reaction] After you deal damage to 1 or more enemies via an event: That enemy's location gets -1 shroud value until the end of the current phase. (Limit once per damage instance.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. The next event you play this round gets -2 cost.
back_flavor: Arturo was taught to respect the power of fire. He grew up in rural Mexico, and with the trace of Aztec blood in his veins came their traditions, including the fire dance to honor Xiuhtecuhtli. But Arturo's mind could not accept mysticism alone. As a young man, he traveled to Mexico City and enrolled in the university there, for he wanted to control and master fire. Adding chemistry to his ancestral skill pleased Arturo, but it attracted the attention of people who sought his talents for destruction in the name of a being called Cthugha, an eternal and inconceivable fire. As before, Arturo could not accept a fire that science could not explain. He fled the cult, making his way as a performer as he searched for explanations to these impossible things. There was no fire he could not master.
back_text: Deck Size: 30 Deckbuilding Options: Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-3, Seeker cards ([seeker]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): 2 copies of Breath of Fire, Fire Eating, Uncontrolled Fire, 1 random basic weakness. Deckbuilding Restrictions: Your deck must have at least 10 more Mystic cards than Seeker cards.

flavor: "The joke may be on us, but we'll be the ones laughing at the end of the day."
name: Effie Dunlap
text:
[reaction] After a non-weakness asset you control leaves play: Play an asset, paying its cost. (Limit once per phase.)
[elder_sign] effect: +1. You may choose an asset in your discard pile and shuffle it back into your deck.
back_flavor: Effie was a born optimist, in spite of everything. When her parents died, there was certainly nothing to laugh about, but it seemed like a joke when she was sent to live with her uncle, a clown at a local circus. Effie was like her uncle in almost every way, and as he taught her the tricks of the trade, she learned something else - that her uncle had the same strange dreams that she did. Identical gruesome creatures and cosmic vistas lurked in both their dreams, but what could either of them do but laugh at it? At first it was merely something to bond after a few short years, Effie's uncle passed away from a heart attack after reciting words she couldn't understand. There was more to these dreams than wild imagination, and Effie resolved to seek out these horrors and do what she does best - laugh in their faces.
back_text: Deck Size: 30 Deckbuilding Options: Survivor cards ([survivor]) level 0-3, Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-3, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Bright Side of Life, Pratfall, 1 random basic weakness. Deckbuilding Restrictions: Your deck must have at least 10 more Survivor cards than Guardian cards.

flavor:
"The Dunya is not the resting place.
It is the testing place."
name: Fakir's Sword
text:
Tarun Chandavarkar deck only. Uses (4 charges).
[action]: Fight. You get +1 [combat] for this attack. If you succeed, you may spend up to 2 charges to deal that much additional damage for this attack.

flavor: "This would have been a simple task for my father..."
name: Measuring Up
text: Revelation - Put Measuring Up into play in your threat area. You cannot choose to assign damage or horror to assets. [action] Take 2 damage, 2 horror, or any combination thereof: Discard Measuring Up. You cannot trigger Tarun's [reaction] ability while resolving this ability.

name: Juggler's Batons
text:
Natalie Soulier deck only.
[reaction] After Juggler's Batons enters play: Draw a card for each asset you control in excess of available slots.
[action]: Place Juggler's Batons on the bottom of your deck.

flavor: "I can't let such things distract me..."
name: Losing Focus
text: Revelation - Put Losing Focus into play in your threat area. Forced - After you discard 1 or more cards during the upkeep phase: Take 1 horror. [action][action]: Discard Losing Focus

name: Feats of Daring
text:
Lai Jie deck only. Permanent.
[reaction] After an investigator initiates a skill test: Commit one of your skills attached to that investigator's location to that test. After resolving the test, attach that skill to the location instead of discarding it. (Limit once per investigator per round.)

flavor: "Death watches as eagerly as the audience!"
name: Death Defying
text:
Lai Jie deck only.
If this test is successful, draw 1 card for each keyword on the target card. (Hunter, Massive, Retaliate, Alert, Peril, Surge, Haunted, etc.)

flavor: "Now watch me do it with one hand behind my back!"
name: Foolhardy
text: Revelation - Put Foolhardy into play in your threat area. Forced - After you resolve a test and did not succeed by 2 or more: Take 1 damage or 1 horror (choose one). Forced - At the end of your turn, if you took 2 or more tests during your turn, discard Foolhardy. Otherwise, shuffle Foolhardy back into your deck.

name: Fire Eating
text:
Arturo Rangel deck only. Uses (2 charges).
[reaction] After you activate the [reaction] ability on Arturo Rangel: Add 1 charge to Fire Eating.
[fast] During your turn, except during an action, spend X charges, where X is half your location's shroud value (rounded up, minimum 1): Discover a clue from your location.

name: Breath of Fire
text:
Arturo Rangel deck only.
Fight. Add your [willpower] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed, attach Breath of Fire to the target.
[fast]: Deal 1 damage to the attached enemy. You may activate this ability from any location. (Limit once per round.)

flavor:
"Money is, in some respects, like fire. It is a very excellent servant, but a terrible master."
—P. T. Barnum, The Art of Money Getting
name: Uncontrolled Fire
text: Revelation - Discard a non-weakness event in your hand. Then, deal 1 damage to each investigator at your location. If you cannot discard an event, shuffle Uncontrolled Fire back into your deck.

name: Bright Side of Life
text:
Effie Dunlap deck only.
[reaction] After a non-weakness asset you control leaves play, exhaust Bright Side of Life: Draw a card.

name: Pratfall
text: Revelation - You must discard up to 2 non-weakness assets you control. For each asset you cannot or choose not to discard, lose 1 action instead. You cannot trigger player effects in response to discarding the chosen assets.

name: Barbell
text: Limit 1 per investigator. [action]: Choose an investigator at your location. Each non-weakness card in the chosen investigator's hand with exactly 1 icon gains [combat] until the end of the round. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension - You succeed at a test with 6 or more [combat] and/or [wild] icons committed: Your basic attack actions deal +1 damage.

name: Barbell
text: Limit 1 per investigator. [action]: Choose an investigator at your location. Each non-weakness card in the chosen investigator's hand with 2 or fewer icons gains [combat] until the end of the round. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension - You succeed at a test with 6 or more [combat] and/or [wild] icons committed: Your basic attack actions deal +1 damage.

name: Bullhorn
text: [action] Exhaust Bullhorn: Engage. Engage each enemy at your location. Tension - You are engaged with 2 or more non-swarm enemies: Your engage and play actions do not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Bullhorn
text: [action] Exhaust Bullhorn: Engage. Engage each enemy at your location. Tension - You are engaged with 2 or more non-swarm enemies: Your engage, draw, resource, and play actions do not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Chakram
text: [action] If Chakram is ready: Fight. You get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you do not succeed by 2 or more, exhaust Chakram. Tension - You succeed on an attack with Chakram by 4 or more: Chakram no longer exhausts if you do not succeed by 2 or more.

name: Chakram
text: [action] If Chakram is ready: Fight. You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. If you do not succeed by 2 or more, exhaust Chakram. Tension - You succeed on an attack with Chakram by 4 or more: Chakram no longer exhausts if you do not succeed by 2 or more.

name: Invisible Wall
text: Uses (3 charges). [reaction] When a non-Elite enemy would move to your location, spend 1 charge: Cancel that movement. Tension - You spend the last charge on Invisible Wall: Invisible Wall gains "[fast]: Discard Invisible Wall and draw a card."

name: Invisible Wall
text: Uses (3 charges). [reaction] When a non-Elite enemy would move to your location, spend 1 charge: Cancel that movement and deal 1 damage to the target enemy. Tension - You spend the last charge on Invisible Wall: Invisible Wall gains "[fast]: Discard Invisible Wall and draw 2 cards."

name: Marching Drum
text: [reaction] After you enter a location, exhaust Marching Drum: Choose an investigator at a connecting location and move them to your location. Tension - You enter a location with 2 or more total non-swarm enemies at that location and/or treacheries attached to that location: You get +1 [agility].

name: Marching Drum
text: [reaction] After you enter a location, exhaust Marching Drum: Choose any number of investigators among connecting locations and move them to your location. Tension - You enter a location with 2 or more total non-swarm enemies at that location and/or treacheries attached to that location: You get +1 [agility].

name: Réka Zilahy
text: You get +1 [combat]. [reaction] When a card is committed to a test you are performing, exhaust Réka Zilahy and deal 1 damage to her: Double the icons on that card. Tension - Your [combat] value is 12 or higher during a skill test: Ignore the cost of dealing damage to Réka Zilahy for the above [reaction] ability.

name: Réka Zilahy
text: You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [combat]. [reaction] When a card is committed to a test you are performing, exhaust Réka Zilahy and deal 1 damage or 1 horror to her: Double the icons on that card. Tension - Your [combat] value is 10 or higher during a skill test: Ignore the cost of dealing damage or horror to Réka Zilahy for the above [reaction] ability.

name: Demonstration
text:
Fast. Play after you succeed at any skill test.
The next time another investigator initiates a test this round using the same skill, that investigator gets +2 skill value for that test.

name: Demonstration
text:
Fast. Play after you succeed at any skill test.
The next time another investigator initiates a test this round using the same skill, that investigator gets +3 skill value for that test.

name: "Drum roll, please!"
text:
Play only as your first action. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
For the remainder of the round, each time you succeed at a skill test, choose 2 different options (max 3 times):
◊ Draw a card.
◊ Gain a resource.
◊ Heal 1 damage or 1 horror.

name: "Drum roll, please!"
text:
Fast. Play at the start of your turn.
For the remainder of the round, each time you succeed at a skill test, choose 2 different options (max 4 times):
◊ Draw a card.
◊ Gain a resource.
◊ Heal 1 damage or 1 horror.

flavor: You were expecting a human cannonball?
name: Light the Fuse
text: Attach Light the Fuse to your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension - The investigation phase begins: Light the Fuse gains: "[fast]: Discard Light the Fuse: Deal 2 damage to each enemy and investigator at the attached location. You may activate this ability from any location."

name: Light the Fuse
text: Attach Light the Fuse to your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension - The investigation phase begins: Light the Fuse gains: "[fast]: Discard Light the Fuse: Deal 3 damage to each enemy at the attached location. Each investigator at that location tests [agility] (3). Each investigator who succeeds disengages from each enemy and move to a connecting location. Each investigator who fails takes 3 damage. You may activate this ability from any location."

name: Live Dangerously
text: Fast. Play when your turn begins. Put Live Dangerously into play in your play area. [reaction] After an enemy attacks you (even if that attack was canceled): Draw a card or gain a resource. If that enemy had 4 or more health, draw an additional card or gain an additional resource. Forced - At the end of the round, discard Live Dangerously.

name: Live Dangerously
text: Fast. Play when your turn begins. Put Live Dangerously into play in your play area. [reaction] After an enemy attacks you (even if that attack was canceled): Draw 2 cards, gain 2 resources, or any combination thereof. If that enemy had 4 or more health, draw an additional card or gain an additional resource. Forced - At the end of the round, discard Live Dangerously.

name: Make an Entrance
text:
Fast. Play after you enter a location with 1 or more enemies present.
The next time that you succeed at a skill test this round, deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location and discover a clue from your location.

name: Make an Entrance
text:
Fast. Play after you enter a location with 1 or more enemies present.
For the remainder of the round, after you succeed at a skill test, deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location and discover a clue from your location (max 3 times).

flavor: "Purity of purpose requires purity of spirit."
name: Ritual Cleansing
text:
Fast. Play when the round begins.
Choose an investigator at your location. Until the end of the round, when the chosen investigator reveals a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder thing] token, ignore the effects of that token (except for its modifier).

flavor: "Purity of purpose requires purity of spirit."
name: Ritual Cleansing
text: Fast. Play when the round begins. Choose an investigator at your location. Until the end of the round, when the chosen investigator reveals a [skull], [cultist], [tablet], or [elder thing] token, ignore the effects of that token (except for its modifier) and heal 1 damage from that investigator or an Ally asset they control.

name: Slapstick
text:
Fast. Play after a game effect is canceled or ignored by a player effect at your location.
Heal 1 horror or discover a clue at your location.

name: Slapstick
text:
Fast. Play after a game effect is canceled or ignored by a player effect at your location.
Heal 2 horror or discover 2 clues at your location, or any combination thereof.

name: Take the Reins
text:
Fast. Play after another investigator at your location fails a skill test.
Attempt that test. If you succeed, also cancel all effects of the first failed test.

name: Take the Reins
text:
Fast. Play after another investigator at your location fails a skill test.
Attempt that test. If you succeed, also cancel all effects of the first failed test. Then, both you and the chosen investigator may draw a card.

name: Test of Endurance
text: Fast. Play when the round begins. Put Test of Endurance into play with X+1 resources on it. [reaction] After amount of damage and/or horror is dealt to you, remove 1 resource from Test of Endurance: Heal 1 damage or horror from you or an Ally asset you control. (Limit once per instance.) Forced - At the end of the round, discard Test of Endurance.

name: Test of Endurance
text: Fast. Play when the round begins. Put Test of Endurance into play with X+1 resources on it. [reaction] After any amount of damage and/or horror is dealt to you, remove up to that many resources from Test of Endurance: For each resource removed, heal 1 damage or 1 horror from you or an Ally asset you control. Forced - At the end of the round, discard Test of Endurance.

flavor: "A challenge this meager is almost insulting!"
name: Bravado
text: If you drew a treachery this round, Bravado gains [willpower]. If you drew an enemy this round, Bravado gains [combat].

flavor: "A challenge this meager is almost insulting!"
name: Bravado
text: If you drew a treachery this round, Bravado gains [willpower][intellect]. If you drew an enemy this round, Bravado gains [combat][agility].

name: Team Effort
text: While Team Effort is in your hand or committed to a test, it gains the icons on each Ally asset you control. If you succeed, heal 1 damage or 1 horror from an Ally asset you control

name: Team Effort
text: While Team Effort is in your hand or committed to a test, it gains the icons on each Ally asset at your location. If you succeed, heal 1 damage and 1 horror from an Ally asset at your location.

name: Unflappable
text: Unflappable gains [wild] for every 4 total damage and/or horror on your investigator card.

name: Unflappable
text: Unflappable gains [wild] for every 4 total damage and/or horror among cards you control.

name: Memorization
text: Limit 1 per investigator. [reaction] When 1 or more of your cards would enter your discard pile during the upkeep phase, exhaust Memorization: Choose 1 of those cards and shuffle it back into your deck instead. Tension - You draw 4 or more total cards during your turn: You may choose an additional card when you activate the above [reaction] ability.

name: Memorization
text: Limit 1 per investigator. [reaction] When 1 or more of your cards would enter your discard pile during the upkeep phase, exhaust Memorization: Choose up to 2 of those cards and shuffle them back into your deck instead. Tension - You draw 4 or more total cards during your turn: You may choose an additional card when you activate the above [reaction] ability.

name: Mind Reading
text: Uses (4 secrets). [action] Spend 1 secret and choose an enemy at your location: Investigate. This test uses the chosen enemy's fight value instead of your location's shroud value. This action does not provoke acts of opportunity. Tension - You successfully use the above [action] ability on an enemy with fight value greater than its location's shroud value: If you succeed on the above [action] ability, you discover 1 additional clue (including the action if was activated).

name: Mind Reading
text: Uses (5 secrets). [action] Spend 1 secret and choose an enemy at your location: Investigate. This test uses the chosen enemy's fight value instead of your location's shroud value. This action does not provoke acts of opportunity. Tension - You successfully use the above [action] ability on an enemy with fight value equal to or greater than its location's shroud value: If you succeed on the above [action] ability, you discover 1 additional clue (including the action if was activated).

name: Segmented Lens
text: [reaction] After Segmented Lens enters play: Look at the top X cards of your deck, where X is your location's printed shroud value. Put them back on top of your deck in any order. Tension - You discover 4 or more clues during your turn: Segmented Lens gains "[fast]: Exhaust Segmented Lens: Look at the top card of any player's deck or the encounter deck."

name: Segmented Lens
text: [reaction] After Segmented Lens enters play: Look at the top X cards of your deck, where X is equal to 2 + your location's printed shroud value. Put them back on top of your deck in any order. Tension - You discover 4 or more clues during your turn: Segmented Lens gains "[fast]: Exhaust Segmented Lens: Look at the top card of any player's deck or the encounter deck."

name: Simon Carver
text: You get +1 [willpower]. [reaction] After Simon Carver enters play: Name a Trait and look at the top 5 cards of your deck. For each card with the named Trait, you may either draw or discard that card. Shuffle the searched deck. Tension - You play 3 cards in the same round that share a Trait: Simon Carver gets +1 health and +1 sanity.

name: Simon Carver
text: You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [intellect]. [reaction] After Simon Carver enters play: Name a Trait and look at the top 5 cards of your deck or the encounter deck. For each card with the named Trait, you may either draw or discard that card. Shuffle the searched deck. Tension - You play 3 cards in the same round that share a Trait: Simon Carver gets +1 health and +1 sanity.

flavor: "Where is that thing even plugged in?"
name: Spotlight
text: [reaction] After Spotlight enters play: Reduce your location's shroud value by 2 until the end of your turn. Tension - The last clue on your location is discovered: You get +1 [intellect].

name: Spotlight
text:
[reaction] After Spotlight enters play: Reduce your location's shroud value by 2 until the end of the round.
Tension - The last clue on your location is discovered: You get +1 [intellect] and +1 [agility].

name: Tuning Fork
text:
[action] Exhaust Tuning Fork: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] for this test for each treachery in your threat area, attached to your location, and next to the agenda deck.
Tension - You successfully investigate a location with Tuning Fork with +3 or more [intellect] from its ability: If you succeed when using the above [action] ability, you discover an additional clue.

name: Tuning Fork
text:
[action] Exhaust Tuning Fork: Investigate. You get +1 [intellect] for this test for each treachery in your threat area, attached to your location, and next to the agenda deck.
Tension - You successfully investigate a location with Tuning Fork with +2 or more [intellect] from its ability: If you succeed when using the above [action] ability, you discover an additional clue.

name: Equilibrium
text:
Look at the top 2 cards of your deck and the top 2 cards of the encounter deck. Choose and discard 2 of those cards. Return the remaining cards to the tops of their respective decks in any order.
If you did not discard any encounter cards, discover a clue from your location.

name: Equilibrium
text:
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck and the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Choose and discard 3 of those cards. Return the remaining cards to the tops of their respective decks in any order.
If you did not discard any encounter cards, discover 2 clues from your location.

name: Masquerade
text:
As an additional cost to play Masquerade, place one of your clues on your location.
Evade. You may use [intellect] instead of [agility] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, and the target is non-Elite, discard that enemy.

name: Masquerade
text:
As an additional cost to play Masquerade, place one of your clues on your location.
Evade. You may use [intellect] instead of [agility] for this evasion attempt. If you succeed, and the target is non-Elite, discard that enemy.

name: Multitasking
text: Draw 1 card for each different type of action you have performed this round (including this action) (types include activate, engage, evade, fight, investigate, move, play, resource, and draw).

name: Multitasking
text:
Fast.
Draw 1 card for each different type of action you have performed this round (types include activate, engage, evade, fight, investigate, move, play, resource, and draw).

name: Muscle Memory
text:
Fast. Play after an investigator at your location plays an asset.
That investigator may immediately play another asset at -1 cost.

name: Muscle Memory
text:
Fast. Play after an investigator at your location plays an asset.
That investigator may immediately play up to 2 other assets at -2 cost each.

name: Pyrotechnics
text:
Fight or Evade. Add your [intellect] value to your skill value for this test. If you succeed, attach Pyrotechnics to the target enemy.
Forced - At the start of the investigation phase, deal 1 damage to the attached enemy and discard Pyrotechnics.

name: Pyrotechnics
text:
Fight or Evade. Add your [intellect] value to your skill value for this test. If you succeed, attach Pyrotechnics to the target enemy.
Forced - At the start of the investigation phase, deal 2 damage to the attached enemy and 1 damage to each other enemy at its location, and discard Pyrotechnics.

name: Rapid Calculation
text:
Fast. Play after you place 1 of your clues on your location.
Discover a clue from your location. Draw a card.

name: Rapid Calculation
text:
Fast. Play after you place any amount of your clues on your location.
Discover that many clues from your location. For each clue discovered, draw a card.

name: Read the Audience
text:
Fast. Play during your turn.
Attach Read the Audience to your location.
Tension - An enemy moves to the attached location or makes an attack at the attached location: The attached location gets -2 shroud value. Each enemy at the attached location gets -1 evade.

name: Read the Audience
text:
Fast. Play during your turn.
Attach Read the Audience to your location.
Tension - An enemy moves to the attached location, makes an attack or activates a forced effect printed on that enemy at the attached location: The attached location gets -3 shroud value. Each enemy at the attached location gets -2 evade.

name: "Silence, please!"
text:
Fast. Play when you initiate a skill test.
Non-weakness cards cannot be committed to this test. Other events cannot be played until this test resolves. If this test succeeds, discover 2 clues from your location.

name: "Silence, please!"
text:
Fast. Play when you initiate a skill test.
Non-weakness cards cannot be committed to this test. Other events cannot be played until this test resolves. If this test succeeds, discover 2 clues from among your location and connecting revealed locations.

name: Subliminal Messaging
text:
Fast. Play after you discover 1 or more clues.
Give 1 to 3 clues to another investigator at your location. If you gave 3 clues, the chosen investigator draws a card.

name: Subliminal Messaging
text:
Fast. Play after you discover 1 or more clues.
Give 1 to 3 clues to another investigator at your location. The chosen investigator draws a card for each clue given.

name: Concentration
text:
Practiced.
Concentration gains [wild] for every 2 clues you control (max +3).

name: Concentration
text:
Practiced.
Concentration gains [wild] for every 2 clues you control (max +3). If you succeed, lower your location's shroud value by 1 until the end of the phase.

name: Precision
text:
Practiced. Expert.
If you discovered 1 or more clues this round, Precision gains [intellect]. If you placed 1 or more clues on your location this round, Precision gains [agility].

name: Precision
text:
Practiced. Expert.
If you discovered 1 or more clues this round, Precision gains [willpower] [intellect]. If you placed 1 or more clues on your location this round, Precision gains [willpower] [agility].

name: Synchronized
text:
Practiced. Expert.
If this test is successful, each investigator who committed 1 or more cards to this test draws a card.

name: Synchronized
text:
Practiced. Expert.
If this test is successful, each investigator who committed 1 or more cards to this test draws a card. If this test fails, return each committed card not named Synchronized to their owners' hands.

name: Alma Rowland
text:
You get +1 [agility].
[action] Exhaust Alma Rowland and discard an asset you control: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Tension - You defeat an enemy with the above [action] ability: When you discard an asset to pay for the above [action] ability, you may instead shuffle the chosen asset back into your deck

name: Alma Rowland
text:
You get +1 [willpower] and +1 [agility].
[action] Exhaust Alma Rowland and discard an asset you control: Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location (2 damage instead if the chosen asset had "Uses (X)" and at least 1 resource on it). This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
Tension - You defeat an enemy with the above [action] ability: When you discard an asset to pay for the above [action] ability, you may instead shuffle the chosen asset back into your deck

name: Bullseye Air Pistol
text:
Uses (2 ammo).
[action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +1 [willpower] and deal +1 damage for this attack.
Tension - You successfully attack an exhausted enemy with the above [action] ability: At the start round, Bullseye Air Pistol replenishes 1 ammo.

name: Bullseye Air Pistol
text:
Uses (3 ammo).
[action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight. You get +2 [willpower] and deal +1 damage for this attack.
Tension - You successfully attack an exhausted enemy with the above [action] ability: At the start round, Bullseye Air Pistol replenishes 1 ammo.

name: Deck of Trick Cards
text:
[action] Exhaust Deck of Trick Cards: Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may pay 1 resource to draw that card.
Tension - You have 8 or more cards in your hand: Deck of Trick Cards gains "[action]: Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.)"

name: Deck of Trick Cards
text:
[action] Exhaust Deck of Trick Cards: Look at the bottom card of your deck. You may pay 1 resource to draw that card.
Tension - You have 6 or more cards in your hand: Deck of Trick Cards gains "[action]: Shuffle your deck. (Limit once per round.)"

name: Disappearing Coins
text:
Uses (1 charge).
Charges on Disappearing Coins may be spent to pay for assets and events.
[reaction] After an investigator at your location spends 3 or more resources at once: Add 1 charge to Disappearing Coins.
Tension - You spend 4 or more resources at once: Reduce the resource requirement of the above [reaction] ability to 2.

name: Disappearing Coins
text:
Uses (3 charges).
Charges on Disappearing Coins may be spent to pay for assets and events.
[reaction] After an investigator at your location spends 3 or more resources at once: Add 1 charge to Disappearing Coins.
Tension - You spend 4 or more resources at once: Reduce the resource requirement of the above [reaction] ability to 2.

name: Hickory Cane
text:
[action] Exhaust Hickory Cane: Fight. You get +1 [willpower] for every 5 resources in your resource pool (max +3). This attack deals +1 damage.
Tension - You have 15 resources in your resource pool: You get +1 [willpower] for the above [action] ability for every 4 resources instead.

name: Hickory Cane
text:
[action] Exhaust Hickory Cane: Fight. You get +1 [willpower] for every 5 resources in your resource pool. This attack deals +1 damage.
Tension - You have 15 resources in your resource pool: You get +1 [willpower] for the above [action] ability for every 4 resources instead.

name: Throwing Knife
text:
[action] Exhaust Throwing Knife: Fight. This attack uses [agility] instead of [willpower]. If you succeed by 2 or more, this attack deals +1 damage.
Tension - You deal damage in excess of an enemy's remaining health via the above [action] ability: The above [action] ability adds your [agility] value to your [willpower] value instead of replacing it.

name: Throwing Knife
text:
Fast.
[action] Exhaust Throwing Knife: Fight. This attack uses [agility] instead of [willpower]. If you succeed by 1 or more, this attack deals +1 damage.
Tension - You deal damage in excess of an enemy's remaining health via the above [action] ability: The above [action] ability adds your [agility] value to your [willpower] value instead of replacing it.

name: Acrobatic Flourish
text:
Fast. Play when you would reveal a token from the chaos bag during a skill test.
Reveal an additional token for this test. If you succeed, deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: Acrobatic Flourish
text:
Fast. Play when you would reveal a token from the chaos bag during a skill test.
Reveal an additional token for this test. If you succeed, deal 2 damage to up to 2 enemies at your location.

name: Balancing Act
text:
Fast. Play during your turn.
Put Balancing Act into play in your play area. Attach any number of assets you control to Balancing Act.
Each attached asset takes up no slots and its text box is treated as if it were blank (except for Traits).
Forced - At the end of the round: Move each asset attached to Balancing Act back into your play area. Discard Balancing Act.

name: Balancing Act
text:
Fast. Play during your turn.
Put Balancing Act into play in your play area. Attach any number of assets you control to Balancing Act.
Each attached asset takes up no slots and its text box is treated as if it were blank (except for Traits).
Forced - At the end of the round: Move each asset attached to Balancing Act back into your play area. Discard Balancing Act. You may immediately trigger an [action] ability on one of the moved assets.

name: Dazzling Spectacle
text:
Fast. Play after you succeed at a skill test.
Dazzling Spectacle gets -1 cost for each non-weakness card committed to that test.
Discover 2 clues from your location.

name: Dazzling Spectacle
text:
Fast. Play after you succeed at a skill test.
Dazzling Spectacle gets -1 cost for each non-weakness card committed to that test.
Discover 2 clues from your location.

name: Grand Finale
text:
Grand Finale gets -1 cost for each other action you have taken this round.
Fight or Investigate. Add your [agility] to your skill value for this test. If you succeed while fighting, this attack deals +3 damage. If you succeed while investigating, you discover 2 additional clues. If it is your turn, end your turn.

name: Grand Finale
text:
Grand Finale gets -1 cost for each other action you have taken this round.
Fight or Investigate. Add your [agility] to your skill value for this test. If you succeed by 2 or more, draw 2 cards. If you succeed while fighting, this attack deals +3 damage. If you succeed while investigating, you discover 2 additional clues. If it is your turn, end your turn.

name: High Flying
text:
Fast. Play after you succeed a skill test by 3 or more.
Repeat the effects of a skill committed to that test.

name: High Flying
text:
Fast. Play after you succeed a skill test by 2 or more.
Repeat the effects of a skill committed to that test.

name: Leap of Faith
text: Move an investigator from a connecting location to your location. The next time this round that you commit a card to a test the chosen investigator is performing, that card gains [skill_wild].

name: Leap of Faith
text: Move an investigator from a connecting location to your location. You may engage any number of enemies engaged with the chosen investigator. The next time this round that you commit a card to a test the chosen investigator is performing, that card gains [skill_wild] [skill_wild]. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

flavor: "... and lands in a basin of water!"
name: Running Start
text: Fight or Evade. If you have moved or been moved at least once this round, you get +1 skill value for this skill test, and if you succeed, deal 1 damage to the target enemy.

flavor: "... and lands in a basin of water!"
name: Running Start
text: Fight or Evade. This ability may target an enemy at a connecting location. If you do, immediately move to that location and engage that enemy. If you have moved or been moved at least once this round, you get +2 skill value for this skill test, and if you succeed, deal 2 damage to the target enemy.

flavor: "Let's hope the wind doesn't pick up."
name: Smoke Bomb
text: Fast. Play during your turn. Attach Smoke Bomb to your location. Investigators get +1 skill value while evading at the attached location. Forced – At the end of the round, discard Smoke Bomb.

flavor: "Let's hope the wind doesn't pick up."
name: Smoke Bomb
text: Fast. Play during your turn. Attach Smoke Bomb to your location. Investigators get +2 skill value while evading and +1 skill value while fighting at the attached location. Forced – At the end of the round, discard Smoke Bomb.

name: "Step right up!"
text: Fast. Play during your turn. Attach "Step right up!" to your location. The first successful skill test performed by each investigator at this location each round succeeds by 1 more. Tension – A test at this location succeeds by 6 or more: "Step right up!" gains: "[action] Discard "Step right up!": Each investigator at the attached location gains 2 resources."

name: "Step right up!"
text: Fast. Play during your turn. Attach "Step right up!" to your location. Each successful skill test at this location each round succeeds by 1 more. Tension – A test at this location succeeds by 6 or more: "Step right up!" gains: "[action] Discard "Step right up!": Each investigator at the attached location gains 2 resources."

name: Contortion
text: If you moved to a location with an enemy this round, Contortion gains [skill_agility]. If you revealed or put a location into play this round, Contortion gains [skill_intellect].

name: Contortion
text: If you moved to a location with an enemy this round, Contortion gains [skill_combat] [skill_agility]. If you revealed or put a location into play this round, Contortion gains [skill_intellect] [skill_intellect].

name: Escalation
text: You may commit Escalation to any type of test you are performing. Increase the difficulty of this test by 1. If you succeed, draw 1 card and gain 1 resource. If you succeed by 2 or more, draw 1 card and gain 1 resource.

name: Escalation
text: You may commit Escalation to any type of test you are performing. Increase the difficulty of this test by 1. If you succeed, draw 1 card and gain 1 resource. Draw 1 additional card and gain 1 additional resource for every 2 points you succeed by.

name: Flowing Motion
text: Max 1 committed per skill test. If this test succeeds by 2 or more, choose another skill committed to this test and commit it to your next skill test this round, if possible.

name: Flowing Motion
text: Max 1 committed per skill test. If this test succeeds by 1 or more, choose another skill committed to this test and commit it to your next skill test this round, if possible.

name: Charmer's Pungi
text: Uses (3 charges). [action]: Search the top 2 cards of your deck for an event and draw it. You may spend 1 charge to search 2 additional cards. Shuffle your deck. Tension – You play 3 total events in the same round: You may search the top 3 cards of your deck instead when activating the above [action] ability.

name: Charmer's Pungi
text: Uses (3 charges). [action]: Search the top 2 cards of your deck for an event and draw it. You may spend 1 charge to search 2 additional cards. Shuffle your deck. Tension – You play 3 total events in the same round: You may search the top 4 cards of your deck instead when activating the above [action] ability.

name: Ermes Menegatti
text: You get +1 [skill_intellect]. [action] Exhaust Ermes Menegatti: Move an unengaged non-Elite enemy from your location to a connecting location, or vice versa. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension – You control 5 or more clues: The above [action] action can target engaged non-Elite enemies.

name: Ermes Menegatti
text: You get +1 [skill_intellect] and +1 [skill_intellect]. [action] Exhaust Ermes Menegatti: Move an unengaged non-Elite enemy from your location to a connecting location, or vice versa. The chosen enemy loses hunter and cannot have doom placed on it until the end of the round. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension – You control 5 or more clues: The above [action] action can target engaged non-Elite enemies.

name: Levitation
text: Uses (3 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Move an investigator at your location to a connecting location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension – You move while an enemy is engaged with you: When you activate the above [action] ability, each non-Elite enemy engaged with the chosen investigator gets -1 fight and -1 evade until the end of the round.

name: Levitation
text: Uses (4 charges). [action] Spend 1 charge: Move an investigator at your location to a connecting location. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity. Tension – You move while an enemy is engaged with you: When you activate the above [action] ability, each non-Elite enemy engaged with the chosen investigator gets -1 fight and -2 evade until the end of the round.

name: Magician's Wand
text: Uses (2 charges). [reaction] After you activate an [fast] ability on an asset you control that takes up 1 or more arcane slots: Add 1 charge to Magician's Wand. [fast] Spend 2 charges: Fight. This attack uses [skill_willpower] instead of [skill_combat] and deals +1 damage. Tension – There are 7 charges on Magician's Wand: When activating the above [fast] ability, you may instead spend 3 charges to deal +2 damage.

name: Magician's Wand
text: Uses (2 charges). [reaction] After you activate an [fast] ability on an asset you control that takes up 1 or more arcane slots: Add 1 charge to Magician's Wand. [fast] Spend 2 charges: Fight. This attack uses [skill_willpower] instead of [skill_combat]. You get +2 [skill_willpower] and deal +1 damage for this attack. Tension – There are 7 charges on Magician's Wand: When activating the above [fast] ability, you may instead spend 3 charges to deal +2 damage.

name: Seeing Stone
text: [reaction] When the round begins or when Seeing Stone enters play: Name a Trait. [reaction] After an investigator draws a card with the chosen Trait, exhaust Seeing Stone: That investigator reveals that card and heals 1 horror. Tension – There is 5 or more doom in play: When activating the first [reaction] ability on Seeing Stone, you may name two Traits instead.

name: Seeing Stone
text: [reaction] When the round begins or when Seeing Stone enters play: Name a Trait. [reaction] After an investigator draws a card with the chosen Trait, exhaust Seeing Stone: That investigator reveals that card, heals 1 horror, and gains 1 resource. Tension – There is 5 or more doom in play: When activating the first [reaction] ability on Seeing Stone, you may name two Traits instead.

name: Wheel of Fire
text: Uses (6 charges). [fast] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [skill_willpower] instead of [skill_combat]. This attack deals +1 damage for each other time you have activated this action this round (max +3). Tension – You successfully attack using the above [fast] ability with 6 or more [skill_willpower] and/or [skill_wild] icons committed: The above [fast] ability ignores the aloof keyword.

name: Wheel of Fire
text: Uses (6 charges). [fast] Spend 1 charge: Fight. This attack uses [skill_willpower] instead of [skill_combat]. You get +2 [skill_willpower] for this attack. This attack deals +1 damage for each other time you have activated this action this round (max +3). Tension – You successfully attack using the above [fast] ability with 6 or more [skill_willpower] and/or [skill_wild] icons committed: The above [fast] ability ignores the aloof keyword.

flavor: "One after the other from my hand!"
name: Duplication
text: Choose an Item asset controlled by an investigator at your location. Its owner searches their deck and discard pile for another copy of that asset (by title) and draws it. Shuffle that player's deck if it was searched.

flavor: "One after the other from my hand!"
name: Duplication
text: Choose an Item asset controlled by an investigator at your location. Its owner searches their deck and discard pile for another copy of that asset (by title), draws it, and plays it, paying its cost. Shuffle that player's deck if it was searched.

flavor: No, the other kind of firewalking.
name: Firewalking
text: Fast. Put Firewalking into play in your play area. [reaction] After you leave a location: Deal 1 damage to each enemy at that location. Forced – At the end of the round, discard Firewalking.

name: Firewalking
text: Fast. Put Firewalking into play in your play area. [reaction] After you enter or leave a location: Deal 1 damage to each enemy at that location (max one location per movement). Forced – At the end of the round, discard Firewalking.

name: Impaling Swords
text: Fight. Add your [skill_willpower] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed, you may repeat this attack on any enemy at your location with +1 difficulty for each time you have already performed this test during this action (max 3 attacks).

name: Impaling Swords
text: Fight. Add your [skill_willpower] value to your skill value for this attack. If you succeed, you may repeat this attack on any enemy at your location with +1 difficulty for each time you have already performed this test during this action (max 5 attacks).

name: "Is this your card?"
text: Look at the top 4 cards of the encounter deck. For each enemy in the looked-at cards, deal 2 damage to each copy of that enemy in play. For each treachery in the looked-at cards, discard each copy of that treachery from play. Return the cards to the top of the encounter deck in any order.

name: "Is this your card?"
text: Look at the top 8 cards of the encounter deck. For each enemy in the looked-at cards, deal 2 damage to each copy of that enemy in play. For each treachery in the looked-at cards, discard each copy of that treachery from play. Return the cards to the top of the encounter deck in any order.

name: Mirror Image
text: Put Mirror Image into play in your play area. [reaction] When an enemy attack or treachery would deal any amount of damage or horror to you: Place 1 of that damage or horror on Mirror Image. (Max 3 tokens on Mirror Image.) Tension – There are 3 tokens on Mirror Image: Mirror Image gains: "[fast] Discard Mirror Image: Automatically evade a non-Elite enemy at your location."

name: Mirror Image
text: Put Mirror Image into play in your play area. [reaction] When an enemy attack or treachery would deal any amount of damage or horror to you: Place 1 of that damage or horror on Mirror Image. (Max 4 tokens on Mirror Image.) Tension – There are 3 tokens on Mirror Image: Mirror Image gains: "[fast] Discard Mirror Image: Automatically evade a non-Elite enemy at your location."

name: "Nothing up my sleeve!"
text: Fast. Play at the start of the investigation phase only if you have 3 or more other cards in your hand. Put "Nothing up my sleeve!" into play in your play area and place each card in your hand facedown beneath it. You get +1 to each of your skills, but you cannot draw cards. Forced – At the end of the round, discard "Nothing up my sleeve!" and draw each card beneath it.

name: "Nothing up my sleeve!"
text: Fast. Play at the start of the investigation phase only if you have 2 or more other cards in your hand. Put "Nothing up my sleeve!" into play in your play area and place each card in your hand facedown beneath it. You get +2 to each of your skills, but you cannot draw cards. Forced – At the end of the round, discard "Nothing up my sleeve!" and draw each card beneath it.

name: Prestidigitation
text: Choose any number of assets you control that use charges, secrets, ammo, or supplies. Move up to 3 resource tokens between any of the chosen assets.

name: Prestidigitation
text: Fast. Play during any [fast] window. Choose any number of assets you control that use charges, secrets, ammo, or supplies. Move up to 3 resource tokens between any of the chosen assets.

name: Rope Trick
text: Attach Rope Trick to your location. Limit 1 per location. [reaction] When the enemy phase begins, exhaust Rope Trick: Non-Elite enemies cannot attack you until the end of the round. Any investigator at the attached location can activate this ability. Forced – At the end of the round: You must either spend 1 resource or discard Rope Trick.

name: Rope Trick
text: Attach Rope Trick to your location. Limit 1 per location. [reaction] When the enemy phase begins, exhaust Rope Trick: Non-Elite enemies cannot attack you until the end of the round. Any investigator at the attached location can activate this ability. Forced – At the end of the round: You must either spend 1 resource or discard Rope Trick.

name: Snake Charming
text: Parley. Test [skill_willpower] (X) where X is the fight value of an enemy at your location. If the target is a Creature enemy, this test gets -2 difficulty. If you succeed, automatically evade the target enemy. If you evaded a non-Elite enemy, it cannot ready during the next upkeep phase.

name: Snake Charming
text: Parley. Test [skill_willpower] (X) where X is the fight value of an enemy at your location. If the target is a Creature or Monster enemy, this test gets -2 difficulty. If you succeed, automatically evade the target enemy. If you succeed by 2 or more, discover a clue at your location. If you evaded a non-Elite enemy, it cannot ready during the next upkeep phase.

name: Court Death
text:
Commit only to a test you are performing.
If a [skull] or [cultist] token is revealed during this test, take 2 damage, 2 horror, or any combination thereof.

name: Court Death
text:
Commit only to a test you are performing.
If a [skull] or [cultist] token is revealed during this test, take 2 damage, 2 horror, or any combination thereof.
If damage and/or horror assigned by this effect defeats an asset, draw 2 cards.

flavor: "Follow my hand as it passes through the ring."
name: Misdirection
text: If you played an asset this round, Misdirection gains [skill_willpower]. If you played an event this round, Misdirection gains [skill_intellect].

flavor: "Follow my hand as it passes through the ring."
name: Misdirection
text: If you played an asset this round, Misdirection gains [skill_willpower] [skill_agility]. If you played an event this round, Misdirection gains [skill_intellect] [skill_agility].

name: Touch of Destiny
text: When you commit Touch of Destiny, you may place 1 doom on an enemy or treachery at your location. If you do, Touch of Destiny gains [skill_wild] [skill_wild].

name: Touch of Destiny
text: When you commit Touch of Destiny, you may place 1 doom on an enemy or treachery at your location. If you do, Touch of Destiny gains [skill_wild] [skill_wild] [skill_wild].

name: Baleful Laughter
text: Uses (4 charges). [reaction] After a non-Elite enemy at your location is evaded, spend 1 charge: That enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase and gets -1 horror until the end of the round. Tension - There are 2 or more exhausted enemies at your location: Baleful Laughter gains: "[action] Discard Baleful Laughter: Heal 1 horror from each investigator and Ally asset at your location."

name: Baleful Laughter
text: Uses (5 charges). [reaction] After a non-Elite enemy at your location is evaded, spend 1 charge: That enemy does not ready during the next upkeep phase and gets -1 horror until the end of the round. Tension - There are 2 or more exhausted enemies at your location: Baleful Laughter gains: "[action] Discard Baleful Laughter: Heal 1 horror from each investigator and Ally asset at your location."

name: Bucket of Grease
text: Uses (3 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: A card at your location loses one of the following keywords until the end of the round: hunter, patrol, retaliate, alert, elusive. Tension - There are 10 or more cards in your discard pile: Bucket of Grease gains: "[action] Discard Bucket of Grease: Move an investigator or non-Elite enemy at your location to a connecting location."

name: Bucket of Grease
text: Uses (4 supplies). [action] Spend 1 supply: A card at your location loses one of the following keywords until the end of the round: hunter, patrol, retaliate, alert, elusive. Tension - There are 10 or more cards in your discard pile: Bucket of Grease gains: "[action] Discard Bucket of Grease: Move an investigator or non-Elite enemy at your location to a connecting location."

name: Coil of Rope
text: [action] During a skill test you are performing, exhaust Coil of Rope: You get +1 skill value for this test for each treachery in your threat area. Tension - You have no cards in your hand or no resources: Coil of Rope gains: "[action] During your turn: Discard Coil of Rope and take an investigate action."

name: Coil of Rope
text: [action] During a skill test you are performing, exhaust Coil of Rope: You get +1 skill value for this test for each treachery at your location. Tension - You have no cards in your hand or no resources: Coil of Rope gains: "[action] During your turn: Discard Coil of Rope and take an investigate action. Your location gets -1 shroud value for this action. If you succeed, discover 1 additional clue."

name: Mallet
text: [action]: Fight. You get +1 [skill_combat] for this attack. If there are more cards in your discard pile than in your deck, this attack deals +1 damage. Tension - You discard an asset you control that takes up 1 or more slots: When you activate the above [action] ability, you may discard the top card of your deck.

name: Mallet
text: [action]: Fight. You get +2 [skill_combat] for this attack. If there are more cards in your discard pile than in your deck, this attack deals +1 damage. Tension - You discard an asset you control that takes up 1 or more slots: When you activate the above [action] ability, you may discard the top card of your deck.

name: Pandora Gould
text: [reaction] After you succeed at a test on an encounter card or take 1 or more actions to discard an encounter card, exhaust Pandora Gould: Reduce the difficulty of your next test this round by 2. Tension - There is at least 1 damage and 1 horror on Pandora Gould: You get +1 skill value during tests printed on encounter cards.

name: Pandora Gould
text: [reaction] After you succeed at a test on an encounter card or take 1 or more actions to discard an encounter card, exhaust Pandora Gould: Reduce the difficulty of your next test this round by 3. Tension - There is at least 1 damage and 1 horror on Pandora Gould: You get +1 skill value during tests printed on encounter cards.

name: Prybar
text: Limit 1 per investigator. You get +1 skill value during basic fight and investigate actions. Tension - You defeat an enemy or discover the last clue from a location during a basic action: Prybar gains: "[action] Discard Prybar: Deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location or discover 2 clues from your location (choose one)."

name: Prybar
text: Limit 1 per investigator. You get +2 skill value during basic fight and investigate actions. Tension - You defeat an enemy or discover the last clue from a location during a basic action: Prybar gains: "[action] Discard Prybar: Deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location or discover 2 clues from your location (choose one)."

flavor: "Whatever doesn't kill you makes you laugh."
name: Brace for Impact
text: Fast. Play after you take 1 or more damage. Gain 2 resources for each damage taken.

flavor: "Whatever doesn't kill you makes you laugh."
name: Brace for Impact
text: Fast. Play after you take 1 or more damage. Gain 2 resources, plus 2 resources for each damage taken.

name: Distraction
text: Put Distraction into play in your play area. Each non-Elite enemy at your location and each connecting location loses all prey keywords and gains "Prey - Bearer of Distraction only." Tension - An enemy makes an attack against you: Distraction gains: "[action] Discard Distraction: Move an enemy at your location to a connecting location."

name: Distraction
text: Fast. Play during your turn. Put Distraction into play in your play area. Each non-Elite enemy at your location and each connecting location gains hunter, loses all prey keywords and gains "Prey - Bearer of Distraction only." Tension - An enemy makes an attack against you: Distraction gains: "[action] Discard Distraction: Move an enemy at your location to a connecting location."

name: "Gotcha!"
text: Fast. Play after you fail a skill test. Deal 1 damage to an enemy at your location and automatically evade it.

name: "Gotcha!"
text: Fast. Play after you fail a skill test. Deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location and automatically evade it.

name: Heart to Heart
text: Fast. Play after 1 or more damage and/or horror is healed from an investigator at your location. Discover a clue at your location or heal 1 additional damage or horror (choose one).

name: Heart to Heart
text: Fast. Play after 1 or more damage and/or horror is healed from an investigator at your location. Discover 2 clues at your location or heal 2 additional damage and/or horror (choose one).

flavor: "At least I saw it coming, right?"
name: Mental Preparation
text: Fast. Play after you take 1 or more horror. Draw 1 card for each horror taken.

flavor: "At least I saw it coming, right?"
name: Mental Preparation
text: Fast. Play after you take 1 or more horror. Draw 1 card, plus 1 card for each horror taken.

flavor: "You sure got the best of me there!"
name: Play the Fool
text: Fast. Play when you initiate a fight test, evade test, or a test printed on a scenario card. This test automatically fails. Discover 1 clue at your location.

flavor: "You sure got the best of me there!"
name: Play the Fool
text: Fast. Play when you initiate a fight test, evade test, or a test printed on a scenario card. This test automatically fails. Discover 2 clues at your location.

flavor: "I wasn't too attached to it anyway."
name: Rebound
text: Fast. Play after an asset you control leaves play. You get +3 skill value for the next test you perform this round.

flavor: "I wasn't too attached to it anyway."
name: Rebound
text: Fast. Play after an asset you control leaves play. You get +3 skill value for each test you perform this round.

name: Safety Net
text:
Uses (3 supplies). If Safety Net has no supplies, discard it.
Attach Safety Net to your location. Limit 1 per location.
[reaction] When you fail a skill test, spend 1 supply: Cancel all effects of the failed test. Any investigator at the attached location can activate this ability.

name: Safety Net
text:
Uses (3 supplies). If Safety Net has no supplies, discard it.
Attach Safety Net to your location. Limit 1 per location.
[reaction] When you fail a skill test, spend 1 supply: Cancel all effects of the failed test. You may then take an immediate action as if it were your turn. Any investigator at the attached location can activate this ability.

name: Thrilling Escape
text:
As an additional cost to play Thrilling Escape, choose and discard an asset you control.
Discard a treachery in your threat area. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.

name: Thrilling Escape
text: Fast. Play during your turn. As an additional cost to play Thrilling Escape, choose and discard an asset you control. Discard a treachery in your threat area. After resolving this effect, take an additional action this turn for each card in your threat area.

name: Cutting Close
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
After you commit Cutting Close, seal 4 random non-[elder_sign] tokens on Cutting Close. After this test resolves, release each token on Cutting Close.

name: Cutting Close
text:
Max 1 committed per skill test.
After you commit Cutting Close, seal 6 random non-[elder_sign] tokens on Cutting Close. After this test resolves, release each token on Cutting Close.

name: Fluke?
text: If this test is successful, discard a non-story asset you control.

name: Fluke?
text: If this test is successful, discard a non-story asset you control.

name: Laugh it Off
text: Max 1 committed per skill test. You may commit Laugh it Off to any type of test. If this test fails, put Laugh it Off into play in your play area and seal each non-[skull] token revealed during this test on it. Forced – At the end of the round, discard Laugh it Off.

name: Laugh it Off
text: Max 1 committed per skill test. You may commit Laugh it Off to any type of test. If this test fails, put Laugh it Off into play in your play area and seal each non-[skull] token revealed during this test on it. Forced – At the end of the mythos phase, discard Laugh it Off.

name: Performer's Costume
text: [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test with a difficulty of 4 or higher, exhaust Performer's Costume: Draw a card or gain a resource (choose one). Tension – Commit another copy of Performer's Costume to a skill test: Performer's Costume gains "[fast] During a skill test you are performing: Increase the difficulty of that test by 1."

name: Performer's Costume
text: [reaction] After you succeed at a skill test with a difficulty of 4 or higher, exhaust Performer's Costume: Draw a card or gain a resource (choose one). Tension – Commit another copy of Performer's Costume to a skill test: Performer's Costume gains "[fast] During a skill test you are performing: Increase the difficulty of that test by 1."

name: Torch
text: Uses (4 supplies). [fast] During a fight, evade, or investigate test at your location, spend 1 supply: Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1. Tension – You reduce the difficulty of a test to 0: Torch gains "[fast] During your turn, discard Torch: Take an additional action this turn."

name: Torch
text: Uses (6 supplies). [fast] During a fight, evade, or investigate test at your location, spend 1 supply: Reduce the difficulty of this test by 1. Tension – You reduce the difficulty of a test to 0: Torch gains "[fast] During your turn, discard Torch: Take an additional action this turn."

flavor: "Keep the audience on the edge of their seats!"
name: Rising Tension
text: Fast. Play at the start of your turn. Choose an asset you control with a Tension effect. Immediately activate its Tension result until the end of the round.

flavor: "Keep the audience on the edge of their seats!"
name: Rising Tension
text: Fast. Play at the start of your turn. Choose up to 3 assets you control with a Tension effect. Immediately activate their Tension results until the end of the round.

name: Breathtaking
text: Breathtaking gains [skill_wild] for each card you control with an inactive Tension result. If you succeed by 2 or more, place 1 Tension token on an asset you control with a Tension effect.

name: Breathtaking
text: Breathtaking gains [skill_wild] for each card you control with a Tension effect. If you succeed by 2 or more, place 1 Tension token on an asset you control with a Tension effect.

name: Growing Suspense
text: Revelation – Put Growing Suspense into play in your threat area. Tension – The investigation phase ends: Each test you perform during your turn gets +1 difficulty. [action][action]: Discard Growing Suspense.

name: Diffident
text: Revelation – Put Diffident into play in your threat area. You cannot take draw or resource actions after your first action each round. [action][action]: Discard Diffident.

name: Overcautious
text: Revelation – Put Overcautious into play in your threat area. You cannot take fight or investigate actions as your first action each round. [action][action]: Discard Overcautious.

name: Indecisive
text: Revelation – Put Indecisive into play in your threat area. Forced – After you play a card: Discard a card from your hand at random. [action][action]: Discard Indecisive.

name: Reluctant
text: Revelation – Put Reluctant into play in your threat area. Forced – After you spend 1 or more resources: Lose half that many resources (rounded up). [action][action]: Discard Reluctant.
